lead_paragraph: Russian doping whistleblower Yulia Stepanova's application to compete as an individual athlete has been accepted, the International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF) said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Stepanova Eligible to Compete as Independent: IAAF
headline.main: Stepanova Eligible to Compete as Independent: IAAF
